name: Sparkling Pomegranate Pitcher Cocktail
description: This easy pitcher cocktail has the lightness of a sparkling summer drink with a hint of rich, fall flavors.
recipeIngredient: 2 ounces fresh juice from 2 to 4 limes

recipeInstructions.text: For the Pomegranate Reduction: In a small saucepan, bring pomegranate juice to a boil over high heat, then reduce to a simmer and cook until reduced to 3 ounces (6 tablespoons), 10 to 15 minutes. Let cool. Store in an airtight container up to 1 month.

For the cocktails: In a pitcher, add the pomegranate reduction, Cocchi Rosa, and lime juice. Top with sparkling wine and gently stir to combine. To serve, divide between 4 glasses filled with ice. Express orange oil from twists over each drink, then add twists to each glass to garnish.
